评论详情: These are great water shoes! Wide in the toes, easy to put on and off, easy to swim with, and nice to walk on rocky beaches with. Sand does get in them easily so I suggest wearing dive socks with them.

评论概述: Worked well just not high quality
评论详情: The tab to tighten the laces broke off on the first day I used them. I had needed something with arch support because I cannot wear flat shoes. While the insert is somewhat molded and not flat, it is far from providing any arch support if you need it. I had stick on arch pads that I added and lasted through my vacation. These are definitely better than flimsy $10 water shoes. I have wide feet and these are definitely wide. Don’t recommend for a narrow foot because you’ll have to over tighten and the tab might break off.

My husband and I  both got a pair. They fit well, they add arch support (which I  need), they are easy to walk in the water, and they dry fast.When my husband tried them on the elastic that tightens them, broke on 1 shoe. The next day at the pool I had an elastic tighten break. 3 days later, the elastic broke on a 3rd shoe.

类型: Size: 8 Wide Women/7 Wide MenColor: Grey With Rose
评论详情: I love these water shoes but I received a pair with a manufacturing defect on the right insole. It appears that the fabric was sewn bunched up somehow. I didn’t notice until I actually wore them in the water. It was really uncomfortable and felt like the fabric was slipping during my water aerobics. I already had to send back a previous pair because they have the 7.5 listed as a size 39 in European sizing which really it’s supposed to be 38 so I sent the 7.5 back and got the 7. The 7 fits much better. I really don’t want to hassle of returning these too so if I could get a replacement for the right insole that would be great and I would change my rating. As far as performance, other than the odd feeling, they feel wonderful! I have high arches so the arch support is great for doing my water aerobics! A lot easier on my joints too. If I could just get a replacement size 7 right insole. That would be wonderful.

nice fit they run a little big had to get a smaller size
True to size(US) Super comfortable and the inner soles are the deal maker for me! Arch included. Adjustable to fit the way I like. If you wear sket;&”rs shoes and like the width… these fit!
These water shoes have a pretty solid bottom, not like a flimsy slipper. Easy to get on and off with adjustable strap; sturdy enough for walking on pebbles and rocks.
Very comfortable
I wore these shoes to the rainforest for almost 12 hours. They were comfortable and durable

I really like the fit and style of these shoes.  However the insert is very thin and doesn't work for me.  I've only found one insert on Amazon that is waterproof, and I'm hoping that will solve my issues.  The reviews said this was a great walking/hiking shoe, but it's not working for me with the current inserts.  There's just not enough support.  I sill gave it 4 stars cuz I really like the style and fit, and am hoping a new insert will make it a great water shoe.

I love these shoes, we do a lot of kayaking in the river, sometimes must get out and drag kayak over low area  and must walk on rocky bottoms, these shoes do the trick.  Also wore them to the beach over hot sand and into the water and wonderful to swim with.  I actually bought two pairs.  Can't to wrong with these.

True to size (8 women's) and easy to get on. Nice wide toe box and flexible enough to fit in my kayak. The shoe does hang up in my boat a little and I was afraid the shoe might come off when I had to wet exit the boat. So, I added a piece of felt to the inside of the heel to keep the shoe from slipping off my foot.
Very good sole and insert. Just wish top material is  more stretchy to fit any foot. My feet tend to swell so stretch material would be more comfortable.
Excelente diseño, muy cómodos y se ven de muy buena calidad los materiales

Bought these for my first Spartan Race and I couldn’t be happier. Extremely comfortable and great grip, never slipped on any of the walls or nub obstacles. My only negative is that there are a couple tears now after the race, but that are still fully functioning. For the price, they are awesome! I will buy a new set before next race as I intended to run these into the ground.
Did some hiking through the jungles, waded through  some underground caves and sinkholes in these bad boys and they were solid! Glad I purchased them.
Great product! Order half size smaller tho.

Best water shoes!  Bought 3 pairs. One for my husband, son, and myself.  Love them! Comfortable, flexible, and sturdy for walking on rocky beaches covered with sharp shells.  Wore them for hours on end. They were light enough to swim in. Great product!

Great!! Bought these for my significant other, he didn’t complain. We went ATViny and zip lining not once did i hear him say the rocks hurt his feet! Awesome for sensitive feet! And they are pretty sturdy!
I love these shoes, they fit perfect and are so comfortable.

评论概述: Very comfortable water shoe, even not in water
评论详情: I wear these most of the time in the summer.  Typically I go bare foot, but when I’m out and about in public I still wear them…unless I’m going to church.

I needed something with grip for the hike to the waterfalls or whatever other wet spot I might be going and then something I could walk around in the water with and not worry about.  These have fit the bill just as well as I could hope.  Light, comfortable and no slippage problem except on the very mossiest of rocks.  When these wear out I won't hesitate to order more.

Took these on a 3 day and 3 night kayaking trip. Through rocks, mud, sand, and water, these shoes were excellent! I might go a half-dozen down from what I usually wear the next time I buy them, but even a bit big, they're still very comfortable. Definitely worth the cheap price tag.
Not having a size 10.5
I wear a size 11, fit perfectly. Exactly what I needed for my trip to Kauai.

There were perfect for a trip to antelope canyon.  They were durable, breathable,  and withstood the 116 degree weather clinging and hiking on hot rocks and sand.  Well worth the money. Normally i wear a size 6.5 or 7. I purchased the 7 because I have wide feet, I probably could have sized down but too lazy too return them.  Great purchase for kayaking,  paddleboarding,  and hiking through wet terrain.
looks like it will be a great boat /water shoe/
I love these light walking shoes!
It spends half the price than major brands but with the same quality.
I like the light weight of the shoes

I bought these shoes, because I have bunions on both of my feet, and they always make my feet feel like they are breaking.  I also have a bone spur on the top of one of my feet which the top of shoes causes it to hurt.  So, I bought a pair of these thinking what do I have to lose.  These shoes turned out to be great! The soles are thick enough that when I walk on rocks, it is just like walking on rocks with regular shoes on.  And, the rest of the shoe is some kind of stretchy material, so they don't hurt my feet.  They are super comfortable, and many people have asked me where I got them so they can get a pair.  I will be buying some more, because my feet feel real good in them, and they are just cool!
Practical and good value
